extension.description: Portuguese version of all texts used in Kodi.
*CLOSED* XvBMC The Netherlands (Add-ons) Repository | XvBMC-NL (Add-on) Depot | UsagePolicy; https://bit.ly/Disclaimer_XvBMC-NL !!! USE AT YOUR OWN RISK !!!

'XvBMC Nederland' heeft moeten besluiten met deze pagina te stoppen en op slot te zetten (per 26-07-2018), ook de 'XvBMC Repository' is per ommegaande offline, cq. leeggehaald waardoor deze niet meer bruikbaar zal zijn.
De(ze) 'repo' zal alleen worden "vastgehouden" ter voorkoming van kaping in- en onder onze naam, een en ander om eventuele misstanden te voorkomen.
extension.disclaimer: **DOWN!** The owners and submitters to this repository do not host or distribute any of the content displayed by these add-ons nor do they have any affiliation with its content. !!! SHUTDOWN !!! USE-AT-YOUR-OWN-RISK !!! OFFLINE !!!

*GESTOPT* The owners and submitters to this repository do not host or distribute any of the content displayed by these add-ons nor do they have any affiliation with its content. !!! SHUTDOWN !!! USE-AT-YOUR-OWN-RISK !!! OFFLINE !!!
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007
extension.news:
'XvBMC Nederland' heeft moeten besluiten met deze pagina te stoppen en op slot te zetten (per 26-07-2018), ook de 'XvBMC Repository' is per ommegaande offline, cq. leeggehaald waardoor deze niet meer bruikbaar zal zijn.
De(ze) 'repo' zal alleen worden "vastgehouden" ter voorkoming van kaping in- en onder onze naam, een en ander om eventuele misstanden te voorkomen.

Plexus - Any complex structure containing an intricate network of parts. Plexus brings native peer-to-peer support (AceStream and SopCast) for Kodi Entertainment Center for several platforms.[CR][CR]Documentation: (missing)

Plexus - Uma estrutura complexa constituída por uma rede de partes. O Plexus adiciona suporte peer-to-peer nativo (AceStream e Sopcast) ao Kodi Entertainment Center para várias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentação: (em falta)

extension.news: 6.4.1 [upd] Use the activation url provided by the authentication request [add] add Settings - MPEG-DASH - Default to WEBM adaptation set - required for 4k stream automatic selection [add] add Settings - MPEG-DASH - Include VP9.2 - includes HDR content in the manifest [add] add support for &hide_folders=true parameter in search query urls - when added to the url it will hide the Playlists, Channels, and Live folders [add] &seek=<time_in_seconds> to play urls [fix] fix playback of Purchases [fix] fixed saved playlists that don't belong to a channel [fix] mpeg-dash frame rate representation [fix] datetime parsing if no datetime string is available [chg] handle playback monitoring in threads [lang] nl_nl strings |contrib: MB1968| [lang] el_gr strings |contrib: twilight0|

extension.disclaimer: Die von diesem Addon dargestellten Inhalte werden von den Erstellern des Addons weder gehostet oder verbreitet, noch stehen die Ersteller in irgendeiner Beziehung zu den Content-Anbietern.

extension.description:
[COLOR lightblue]Instale nosso repositório oficial (BrazilTV Repo) para receber atualizações e dependências rapidamente![/COLOR]
[B]ATENÇÃO:[/B] Não hospedamos nem temos ligação com nenhum dos conteúdos deste addon, apenas reunimos links de transmissões públicas feitas por terceiros. A estabilidade 100% dos canais não é garantida, mas estamos trabalhando diariamente para tentar mantê-la. Os dados de EPG também são de disponibilidade pública e encontrados na internet. Todos os programas gravados são retirados dos canais oficiais das emissoras no YouTube, e todo o conteúdo é de responsabilidade das mesmas.
extension.news:
[COLOR lime]v1.0 - Versão estável do BrazilTV, aprimoramentos de segurança, correção de erros e novo design.[/COLOR]
[COLOR white][B]Fique atento a atualizações e envie sugestões de funcionalidades na nossa página do Facebook![/B][/COLOR]
